original_text: This was the sin of the house of Jeroboam that led to its downfall and to its destruction from the face of the earth.
korean_text: 이 일이 여로보암 집에 죄가 되어 그 집이 땅 위에서 끊어져 멸망하게 되니라

sentences.original_text: This was the sin of the house of Jeroboam
and to its destruction from the face of the earth
